selection_criteria: Company type: Independent restaurant/retail, small business
Relevant experience/role (operations, procurement, managing small business)
Possible need for bilingual, compliant POS system
outreach_recommendations: Personalize outreach by referencing the lead’s specific business, location, and ownership role.
Highlight Clerq’s full tax compliance and bilingual interface as unique local advantages, especially for Quebec-based and bilingual market owners.
Emphasize the simplicity, sleekness, and support offered by Clerq—pain points for busy owner-operators.
For influential retail service executives (e.g., Jordan Karp), position Clerq as a value-add for their small business clients.
If available, tailor messaging to reference recent business activity (e.g., new store openings, anniversaries, or menu launches) to establish timeliness and relevancy.
Keep outreach concise and demonstrate quick value (e.g., case study, testimonial, demo offer), respecting owners’ limited time.
